[www]
user = www-data
group = www-data
listen = 127.0.0.1:9000
pm = dynamic
pm.max_children = 57
pm.start_servers = 14
pm.min_spare_servers = 14
pm.max_spare_servers = 42
pm.max_requests = 500
pm.process_idle_timeout = 10s

0:
mkdir -p ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh 
cp /config/* ~/.ssh/
echo $'\n' >> ~/.ssh/id_*
restic unlock
restic backup /data
restic forget --keep-weekly 1 --prune

mkdir -p ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh 
cp /config/* ~/.ssh/
echo $'\n' >> ~/.ssh/id_* 
restic init || true
